# A&A AutoMods

> Toronto's premier automotive customization shop. Star headliner, ambient LED lighting, underglow, emergency lighting. 200+ projects in the GTA. Located in Etobicoke, Ontario.

A&A AutoMods specializes in high-end automotive customizations: fiber optic starlight headliners, RGB ambient lighting with smartphone control, premium underglow, and emergency lighting. We serve Toronto, the Greater Toronto Area (GTA), and Ontario.

## Core Pages

- [Home](https://aa-automods.ca/): Overview of A&A AutoMods services and featured projects
- [Services](https://aa-automods.ca/services): Star Headliner, Ambient Lighting, Underglow, Emergency Lighting, Remote Starters, Backup/Dash Cameras, Infotainment, Detailing
- [Gallery](https://aa-automods.ca/gallery): Portfolio of completed car customization projects
- [Contact](https://aa-automods.ca/contact): Get a quote - 27 Haas Rd, Etobicoke ON M9W 3A1, (647) 677-7287, Anthony.aalighting@gmail.com
